GSD.product_version: versions from v4.11 to before v5.10.96
GSD.description:
rpmsg: char: Fix race between the release of rpmsg_ctrldev and cdev

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.96 by commit 1dbb206730f3e5ce90014ad569ddf8167ec4124a, it was introduced in version v4.11 by commit c0cdc19f84a4712cf74888f83af286e3c2e14efd. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: rpmsg: char: Fix race between the release of rpmsg_ctrldev and cdev
